ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( LEFT(RecordType.Id,15) = LEFT($Label.PNG_CaseSupportRecordType,15), $Profile.Name<>"System Administrator",
LEFT(OwnerId,3)='00G' && NOT(ISNEW()) && IF(LEFT(PRIORVALUE(OwnerId),3)='005',FALSE,TRUE)&&
OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "Merged")), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , "Resolved")), OwnerId <> "00G0W000004Hl8s"
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please assisgn to yourself before you can edit case.
